BUCIM.IS.summary: Bursa Cimento Fabrikasi A.S. produces and sells cement and clinker products in Turkey. The company offers Portland, Portland composite, and pozzolanic cement. It also exports its products to Russia, Azerbaijan, Italy, France, Spain, Belgium, Albania, Portugal, Romania, Greece, Libia, Egypt, Algeria, Sudan, Nigeria, Gambia, Cape Verde, Ghana, and Cyprus. The company was incorporated in 1966 and is based in Bursa, Turkey.
